item.title: [delta-317] Divine spirit shield invisible?
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

I added all of the spirit shields to my server all were fine except 2, the arcane is a weapon( i already know how to solve this) and the divine makes the player completely invisible. is this a problem with the models or the ints? here is what i put in class8.java anyways cus im not sure if(i == 9052) // ItemID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 10127; //5 class8.anInt181 = 1540; class8.anInt190 = 336; class8.anInt198 = 1020; class8.anInt204 = 97; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = 15; class8.anInt165 = 55555; //6 class8.anInt200 = 55555; //6 class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Divine spirit shield"; class8.aByteArray178 = "An ethereal shield with an divine sigil attached to it.".getBytes(); }

Iâ€™ll put an image as an attachment.
